publ: by Brugger Christian, Voit Andreas GbR
name: HiraganaTrainer
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hiragana trainer
des:
The japanese language uses three different alphabets. As a beginner it is advisable to start with the so called Hiraganas.
Mesmerizing these 50 signs is no small task but this skill will help you to do it in fast and easy way. 

There is zero configuration effort. The skill will start at the beginning and automatically add new signs as your learning progresses.


This skill requires an Alexa device with a screen (e.g. Echo 5 or 8)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
